Error Severity

CodeDescriptionDeutsch (German)CommentVersion
E ErrorFehlerTransaction was unsuccessfuladded v2.5
F Fatal ErrorMessage not processed due to application or network failure conditionadded v2.6
I InformationInformationTransaction was successful but includes information e.g. inform patientadded v2.5
W WarningWarnungTransaction successful, but there may issuesadded v2.5

name: v2 Error Severity
